page.title: 20Sutton-cum-Lound School
page.content: Children aged 5-ll from Sutton and Lound attend the school. At the moment there are 84 pupils divided into three classes. The children from the upper junior class collected together the information for this survey. They are:- Joanna Cooney, Daniel Bament, Sarah Adams, Angela Hill, Amanda Fey, Edward Watson, Steven Gaunt, David Jackson, Shaun Boddy, Vince Austin, Louise Eliott, Clare Hibbert, Fiona Dowson, Charles Moorman, Sarah Webb, Michael Bell, Caspar Roth, Nicola Mann, Dino Batchelor, Lynsey Nicholson, Sonia White. They were helped by Mrs. G. White, Mrs. E. Watson and Mrs. J. Jackson. Mr. D. Davidson took the photographs.
